pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Clustering of Regression Models Method // We proposed a new model-based clustering method, called the clustering of regression models method(CORM), which groups genes that share a similar relationship to the covariate(s). This method provides a unified approach for a family of clustering procedures and can be applied to data collected with various experimental designs. This package includes the implementation for two such clustering procedures: (1) the Clustering of Linear Models (CLM) method, and (2) the Clustering of Linear Mixed Models (CLMM) method.
